name: node-image-renamer
description: Simple node script for watching and renaming my images according to creation time

scripts.test-script: cp -rp test/fixtures test/_fixtures && node lib/image-renamer.js --no-watch test/_fixtures && [ -f test/_fixtures/2015-09-05--16-25-28.jpg ] && rm -rf test/_fixtures
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-script

author: Blake Embrey <hello@blakeembrey.com>
